entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 9.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
